member.name: EMRSELECTPALETTE
member.summary: The EMRSELECTPALETTE structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. Note that the bForceBackground parameter in SelectPalette is always recorded as TRUE, which causes the palette to be realized as a background palette.

member.name: EMRSELECTPALETTE.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSELECTPALETTE.ihPal
member.summary: Index to logical palette in the handle table.
